title: Jock Sion [READ]
body:
Jock Sion would be a perfect skill.

Use your imagination - pretend, there is Sion. Okay? You got that in your mind? Now, imagine him with football clothes, and a football helmet.

His ultimate would be perfect as a tackle, like in Football. His W could be a transparent football. 

His Q would have the shape of a football when charging up, and enemies would get knocked up and footballs would be thrown into the air as an animation.

His E, would him throwing a football at an enemy.

Add this, please.

replies.body: instead of an axe he could have one of those dummies they tackle
with a bit of work, I think this could be great
